text: Omonville-la-Petite is a former commune. It is in Normandy in the Manche department in northwest France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune of La Hague.Arrêté préfectoral 27 September 2016 Ormonville is known to be the place where French poet Jacques Prévert (1900–1977) lived the last years of his life and where he is buried. == References == Category:Former communes in Manche
title: Omonville-la-Petite
